snippet: State lawmakers who hoped to build fencing along the Mexican border received just a tiny fraction of the donations needed.
abstract: Arizona lawmakers allocate funds raised to build fence along Mexican border to instead buy equipment for Cochise County sheriff’s office after earning only $265,000 out of expected $50 million from private donations.
lead_paragraph: State lawmakers who hoped to build fencing along the Mexican border received just a tiny fraction of the donations needed.

headline.main: Arizona: Donations for Fence Fall Millions Short
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Donations for Fence Fall Millions Short
